document_data.name: Shoudra Stargleam
document_data.mainbody: '''Shoudra Stargleam''' was [[sceptrana]] of [[Mirabar]] in [[1370 DR]], a title that she claimed after assuming control of Mirabar from its previous [[Marchion]].
document_data.Activities:
Her role got involved in signing trade agreements.

Many influential organizations had an interest in Shoudra, including the [[Harpers]], the [[Zhentarim]], and the [[Cult of the Dragon]], the last of which had made at least one attempt on her life.
document_data.Home: She lived in an apartment in Undercity Square, with a balcony view of the eastern gate.
document_data.Appearance: Shoudra had bright blue eyes and long, dark (black) hair. She was tall, with delicate features, but with a masculine build.
